programme.desc: Season 3 premiere. As Pope Alexander (Jeremy Irons) fights for his life after being poisoned, the Cardinals jockey for position to take over the Papacy. Cesare (Francois Arnaud) and Micheletto (Sean Harris) trace the assassination plot back to its source, but Della Rovere (Colm Feore) is ready to make his move. Catherina Sforza (Gina McKee) dispatches her own personal assassin, Rufio (Thure Lindhart), to dethrone the Borgias. However, thanks to Lucrezia's (Holliday Grainger) quick thinking, the family's grip on power may not be lost.(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Graphic Violence, Adult Language

programme.title: The Girl On The Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day. One morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds. Emily Blunt, Lisa Kudrow, Justin Theroux and Allison Janney star.(n)

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: After leaving a party together, coworkers David (Brian Geraghty), Emily (Alice Eve) and Corey (Josh Peck) stop at an ATM. Pulling into a desolate parking lot, Corey gets out to get cash and a routine transaction turns into a struggle for survival when an unknown man appears outside blocking their exit. With the wintry temperatures dipping below freezing, and the morning sunrise still hours away, they have no choice but to play the man's deadly game of cat-and-mouse.(n)

programme.title: Last Weekend
programme.desc: Celia (Patricia Clarkson) is an aging matriarch who wants everyone to gather one last time at her family's gorgeous Lake Tahoe manor and reminisce before she puts it on the market. However, her sons are too preoccupied with their own busy lives and struggling relationships for any nostalgia. The dream of a splendid Labor Day weekend dies quickly in a whirlwind of contention, crisis and family dysfunction. Celia is forced to let go of her fantasy and attend to the harsh reality brought on by a sudden emergency.(n)

programme.title: The Lives of a Bengal Lancer
programme.desc: Three British soldiers stationed on the Northwest Frontier of India, led by a smart but rebellious officer, guard against an invading Afridi force.

programme.title: The Drum
programme.desc: In the 19th century, a young Indian prince attempts to gain back his throne, which was seized from him by his murderous uncle.

programme.title: Party Girl
programme.desc: A lawyer for the mob decides to go straight after one last job. When the job goes south, the lawyer is required to testify against his former bosses. He agrees, but only if his dream girl gets police protection.

programme.title: ...And Justice for All
programme.desc: A crusading defense attorney defends a judge he despises after the respected man is accused of rape. The case is argued in front of another judge who is friendly with the lawyer, but is also a possible suicide risk who keeps a loaded gun on him at all times, including in the courtroom. When horrific realities of the legal system start harming his other clients, the lawyer has something of a meltdown during the rape trial.

programme.title: Revolution
programme.desc: Set during the American Revolution of the 18th century, an immigrant trapper joins the war after he discovers that his young son has been tortured by a British soldier.

programme.title: Bright Road
programme.desc: A dedicated schoolteacher and an understanding principal in help a rebellious student overcome his circumstances and his pride in order to fulfill his potential.

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: Adaptation of Jane Austen's classic 1813 novel about romance and mores in pre-Victorian English society revolves around five middle-class sisters being courted by a variety of suitors. Of special note is the fractious relationship between spirited Elizabeth Bennet and haughty aristocrat Fitzwilliam Darcy.

programme.title: Party Girl
programme.desc: A lawyer for the mob decides to go straight after one last job. When the job goes south, the lawyer is required to testify against his former bosses. He agrees, but only if his dream girl gets police protection.

programme.title: Here Comes Mr. Jordan
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee about a boxer who dies before his time and is whisked away to Heaven, where the mistake is discovered and he is given a second chance in life by a celestial emissary who returns him to Earth in the body of a murdered millionaire. Features an Oscar-winning screenplay. Remade in 1978 as "Heaven Can Wait.

programme.title: A Streetcar Named Desire
programme.desc: Tennessee Williams adapted his Pulitzer-winning character study about an emotionally troubled, faded Southern belle, who moves in with her sister in a seedy New Orleans neighborhood, where her brutish brother-in-law torments her delicate sensibilities, and she becomes even further disconnected from reality. A Best Picture nominee.

programme.title: It Happened at the World's Fair
programme.desc: Elvis Presley vehicle in which he plays a pilot who loses his plane due to gambling debts, so he and his partner head to the 1962 Seattle World's Fair to see if they can get work to earn money to reclaim their impounded aircraft.

programme.title: The Producers
programme.desc: A once-successful theatrical producer and a meek accountant team up and plot to stage a colossal, surefire Broadway flop as a way to bilk investors out of large sums of money. Writer-director Mel Brooks' screenplay won an Oscar; and Gene Wilder was nominated for Best Supporting Actor as the nebbishy bean counter. The film was later made into a Broadway musical and a big-screen songfest.

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Chronicling the whimsical exploits of two children, their nutty-inventor father and his girlfriend in a flying auto in 1909 Britain. The musical gets a lot of mileage out of a tuneful tankful of songs by Richard M. and Robert B. Sherman, with the title number being Oscar nominated. Based on a collection of children's stories by James Bond creator Ian Fleming.

programme.title: The Admirable Crichton
programme.desc: A resourceful butler comes to the aid of an aristocratic family when they are left helpless following a shipwreck.

programme.title: Mare Nostrum
programme.desc: During World War I, a Spanish sea captain falls in love with a German spy.

programme.title: Funny Games
programme.desc: Harrowing drama about a pair of psychopaths who proceed to push the violence envelope while holding a family captive in their vacation home. Susanne Lothar, Ulrich Muhe. Peter: Frank Giering. Paul: Arno Frisch. Written and directed by Michael Haneke.

programme.title: Warped Ones
programme.desc: Two teen criminals and a prostitute go on a rampage in Tokyo.

programme.title: The Hill
programme.desc: During World War II, incorrigible British soldiers are imprisoned in a military stockade in North Africa, where they suffer brutal treatment at the hands of their fellow countrymen who are attempting to break their spirits through grueling, monotonous and pointless projects.

programme.title: Fail Safe
programme.desc: When a misguided transmission sends a squadron of bombers hurtling towards Russia, fully prepared to drop their atomic weaponry on Moscow, an Air Force commander desperately tries to establish radio contact with the planes, but once the pilots have passed the "fail safe" point, they've been instructed to disregard any reversal of orders.

programme.title: Battleship Potemkin
programme.desc: A group of ill-treated sailors decide to rebel against the cruelties of their harsh Imperialist officers during the Russian Revolution and their revolt causes a ripple-effect into the streets of Odessa.

programme.title: Glimpses of Western Germany
programme.desc: Entry in the "Traveltalk" series visits the cities of Munich, Bremen, Hamburg and Heidelberg to examine Germany's post-WWII recovery. Written, directed and narrated by James A. Fitzpatrick.

programme.title: The Great Dictator
programme.desc: In his first full talkie, Charles Chaplin plays both a sweet-natured Jewish barber and Hynkel, a murderous dictator who bears a strong resemblance to Adolf Hitler, who was so incensed by the 1940 comedy that he marked the Little Tramp for death. Chaplin also produced, wrote and directed the film.

programme.title: Paths of Glory
programme.desc: Stanley Kubrick directed this gripping antiwar tract about a battlefield officer-lawyer defending three French soldiers unjustly accused of cowardice during World War I. Based on actual events.

programme.title: The Americanization of Emily
programme.desc: Paddy Chayefsky wrote this satire about a British war widow who falls in love with a cowardly American sailor during World War II.

programme.title: The Steel Helmet
programme.desc: A U.S. Army sergeant attempting to rejoin his allies after being the lone survivor of an attack on his platoon during the Korean War receives unexpected assistance from a Korean boy.

programme.title: MGM Parade Show
programme.desc: (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Shenandoah
programme.desc: A wealthy landowner in Virginia refuses to take sides during the Civil War, though his children are affected by it one by one. Through the war and the various tragedies it brings, the family bond stays strong.(n)

programme.title: The Night of the Hunter
programme.desc: In the 1930s rural South, a psychotic bogus preacher plots to kill a family of three for money that was hidden on a farm by the two children's late father.(n)

programme.title: Bright Leaf
programme.desc: After being driven from his spread by an autocratic tobacco tycoon, a tenant farmer returns in triumph with a revolutionary cigarette-making machine and sets about driving the mogul out of business.(n)

programme.title: Conrack
programme.desc: The story of Pat Conroy, who taught impoverished black children on a South Carolina island to prepare them for life on the mainland. Based on Conroy's 1972 autobiographical novel "The Water Is Wide.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Frank Capra's Best Picture nominee about a wide-eyed patriotic bumpkin named Jefferson Smith (James Stewart), who's appointed to the Senate by corrupt politicos, chief among them and unbeknownst to Smith is a senior senator whom he idolized. Stewart was nominated for Best Actor and the film was up for a total of 10 Academy Awards. A TV series of the same name had a one-season run (1962-3).(n)

programme.title: The Secret Partner
programme.desc: A shipping magnate with a checkered past tries to prove himself innocent of theft when someone robs his company of a hefty sum. His jealous wife may or may not be on his side.(n)

programme.title: The Gazebo
programme.desc: A TV playwright who is being blackmailed over questionable photos from his actress wife's past plots to do away with the blackmailer, but things don't go according to plan. An adaptation of the hit Broadway comedy.(n)

programme.title: Tell-Tale Heart
programme.desc: Adaptation of Edgar Allan Poe's horror tale of a murderer tormented by the sound of his victim's beating heart.(n)

programme.title: Twenty Plus Two
programme.desc: David Janssen searches for a missing heiress and runs into a complicated murder case. Jeanne Crain, Dina Merrill, Jacques Aubuchon, William Demarest, Agnes Moorehead, Brad Dexter. Tough to figure out who, what, when. Joseph M. Newman directed.(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.(n)

programme.desc: Specjalne, mundialowe wydanie programu "Szybkie strzały". Twórcy przeprowadzają nietypową sondę uliczną. Prowadzący zadają napotkanym osobom oryginalne, często wręcz abstrakcyjne pytania. Nieraz potrafią nimi swoich rozmówców mocno zaskoczyć.(n)

programme.desc: Ed Petrie and his CBBC mates go on an adventure to find the most unusual and amazing places in Asia. They have a peek into the Palace of the Winds in India; take some lessons at a school for mascots in Japan; discover a cool collection of masks in Sri Lanka; take a Beatles-inspired trip through lavender fields in Japan and compete in a tribal blowpipe contest in Malaysia! Ed is joined on this bonkers road trip by Cel Spellman, Chris Johnson, Michelle Ackerley, Hacker and Dodge, Victoria Cook and Ben Shires - there's stuff to do in Asia that is totally ace and it turns up All Over The Place!

programme.title: The Dumping Ground
programme.desc: Election fever strikes the Dumping Ground as Tyler and Floss battle it out over a place on a forum for children in care. programme.title: The Dumping Ground
programme.desc: Everyone's missing Mike, so Kazima suggests a trip out to raise the young people's spirits. However, it is not long before they get lost in the countryside. Meanwhile, Ryan starts to wonder if he's gone too far. Drama based on books by Jacqueline Wilson, starring Akuc Bol and Lewis Hamilton.

programme.title: The Dumping Ground
programme.desc: With the clock ticking, Ryan pursues a high-risk strategy to get Mike reinstated at Ashdene Ridge. But can he pull off his master plan without anyone noticing? Drama based on books by Jacqueline Wilson, starring Connor Byrne and Lewis Hamilton.

programme.title: Operation Ouch
programme.desc: The doctors reveal how people taste with their noses as well as their tongues, Dr Xand is on call with the emergency services and Dr Chris makes his skull using 3D printing. Plus, in accident and emergency, a patient has surgery for a cut on her hand, and another has fallen off stilts and cut his eyebrow.

programme.title: Art Ninja
programme.desc: Ricky Martin has never been good at football, so is horrified to hear his Dad has entered him and his 'make-believe' girlfriend into a family tournament. Ricky makes a flickball game and a dotty football boot inspired by artist Yayoi Kusama, before persuading a reluctant Gavin to don a wig and pass as his sweetheart. But how will Ricky turn a thousand balls he's accidentally ordered online into some striking art on the pitch?

programme.title: The Playlist
programme.desc: Lewys Ball invites his vlogger-best-friend Olivia Grace to the studio to play the best tracks on her Playlist. He tests his karaoke skills against hers in a game of Race Against the Mic, finds out if Yes Lad can make it to their set on time after being locked in their dressing room. Plus, Greg James rewinds the week in pop music news.

programme.title: My Life
programme.desc: With just 2 years' experience, Scottish teenager Iona has only five months to prepare for the biggest international competition of her life, the World Junior Surf Championships in the Azores, Portugal. It's a race against time as she trains in sub-zero conditions and battles the unpredictable seas of her home shores to find the perfect wave. It's punishing but day after day Iona dons her wetsuit and dives in. But surfing off Scotland's coast is a world away from the warm, volcanic waters of the Azores, where Iona will be up against the gnarliest (treacherous) waves she has ever faced as well as some of the most experienced and fearless surfers on the planet. Determined not to let herself or her country down, will Iona master the surf - and the pressure - to come home a champion?

Before its current management took over the building the area didn't offer much for the youngsters living there and anti-social behaviour was very common. That has dropped by 73 per cent since Community on Solid Ground came along, the kids can hang out, play sports and have a place to go that means they aren't hanging around the streets. Sadly the facilities are very tired and they don't have areas they can play their beloved sport on, so the Dengineers are going to transform their outside space into a sports arena worthy of the Olympics. Presented by Mark Wright and Lauren Layfield.
